title: Facebook Has 'All Hands on Deck' to Fight Misinformation, Says Sandberg
text: Sheryl Sandberg, Facebook chief operating officer, discusses her view of the impact the coronavirus crisis can have on the U.S. financial and economic system. She speaks on "Bloomberg Technology."

title: Facebook's Sheryl Sandberg: 'All hands on deck' to combat coronavirus misinformation
text: The spread of misinformation is still a big problem for social networks.

title: Facebook Getting Closer To Key Technical Benchmark
text: A Relative Strength Rating upgrade for Facebook shows improving technical performance. Will it continue?

title: Facebook's Sandberg: No one knows how much impact coronavirus will have on marketing industry
text: "This is not going to business as usual, and the marketing industry is certainly going to see a real impact. I don't think anyone knows how big.

title: Why FAANG Stocks Tumbled Today
text: With the market down big on pandemic fears, the largest tech stocks headed lower.

title: Google and Facebook shares could drop another 30% to 40%, Evercore analysts say
text: Despite both companies being about 25% off from their respective 52-week highs, trends show that the tech giants have ample room to fall before reaching panic levels.

title: How the Biggest Tech Stock Winners From the Bull Market Are Doing Now
text: During the most recent bull market, the technology sector was perhaps the biggest winner.

title: Facebook Online Video Ad Plans for IGTV to Boost Ad Revenues
text: Facebook (FB) plans to sell advertisements on IGTV. This is likely to intensify the battle against Alphabet's YouTube, Amazon and others.

title: FAANG stocks diverge in performance as coronavirus reaches critical period
text: It’s looking to be another wild week on Wall Street, with index futures showing hefty drops in the 5% range following the Fed’s announcement over the weekend of an interest rate cut and an expansion of quantitative easing. Around the world, markets in Europe were down heavily as traders surveyed the full scale of the […]
